statements: UPDATE public_transport_usage SET fare = 12.50, distance_traveled = 20.5 WHERE user_id = 101 AND route_id = 201 AND date = '2022-08-15';

UPDATE vehicle_details SET year = 2020, manufacturer = 'Ford', model = 'Mustang' WHERE vehicle_id = '98765432-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';

UPDATE user_profiles SET age = 30, email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
